about_the_game:
This is a role-playing game with a realistic European medieval fantasy theme. The player plays a knight and goes alone to the legendary forbidden island to find out the hidden historical truth hidden in the maze.
Game Features:
1. Fully automatic turn-based combat bid farewell to hard liver,
2. The huge world view and the thick and serious plot,
3. A huge number of mazes are waiting to be explored,
4. The sandbox-style world is free to explore and play repeatedly

content_descriptors.notes: Combat with fantasy cartoon violence, NPC image with sexy figure and slightly exposed clothing

detailed_description:
This is a role-playing game with a realistic European medieval fantasy theme. The player plays a knight and goes alone to the legendary forbidden island to find out the hidden historical truth hidden in the maze.

name: 迷宫骑士

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: win7、win vista、win10
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
